00230 
00231 inline bool MCParticle::SortByEnergy(const MCParticle *const pLhs, const MCParticle *const pRhs)
00232 {
00233     return (pLhs->GetEnergy() > pRhs->GetEnergy());
00234 }

00238 inline bool MCParticle::IsInitialized() const
00239 {
00240     return m_isInitialized;
00241 }

00243 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00244 
00245 inline bool MCParticle::IsRootParticle() const
00246 {
00247     return m_parentList.empty();
00248 }
00249 
00250 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00251 
00252 inline bool MCParticle::IsPfoTarget() const
00253 {
00254     return (this == m_pPfoTarget);
00255 }
00256 
00257 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00258 
00259 inline bool MCParticle::IsPfoTargetSet() const
00260 {
00261     return (NULL != m_pPfoTarget);
00262 }

00264 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00265 
00266 inline StatusCode MCParticle::GetPfoTarget(const MCParticle *&pMCParticle) const
00267 {
00268     if (NULL == m_pPfoTarget)
00269         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00270 
00271     pMCParticle = m_pPfoTarget;
00272 
00273     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00274 }

00283 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00284 
00285 inline StatusCode MCParticle::AddDaughter(MCParticle *pMCParticle)
00286 {
00287     if (!m_daughterList.insert(pMCParticle).second)
00288         return STATUS_CODE_ALREADY_PRESENT;
00289 
00290     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00291 }
00292 
00293 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00294 
00295 inline StatusCode MCParticle::AddParent(MCParticle *pMCParticle)
00296 {
00297     if (!m_parentList.insert(pMCParticle).second)
00298         return STATUS_CODE_ALREADY_PRESENT;
00299 
00300     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00301 }
00302 
00303 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00304 
00305 inline StatusCode MCParticle::RemoveDaughter(MCParticle *pMCParticle)
00306 {
00307     MCParticleList::iterator iter = m_daughterList.find(pMCParticle);
00308 
00309     if (m_daughterList.end() == iter)
00310         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND;
00311 
00312     m_daughterList.erase(iter);
00313 
00314     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00315 }
00316 
00317 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00318 
00319 inline StatusCode MCParticle::RemoveParent(MCParticle *pMCParticle)
00320 {
00321     MCParticleList::iterator iter = m_parentList.find(pMCParticle);
00322 
00323     if (m_parentList.end() == iter)
00324         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND;
00325 
00326     m_parentList.erase(iter);
00327 
00328     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00329 }

00333 inline StatusCode MCParticle::SetPfoTarget(MCParticle *pMCParticle)
00334 {
00335     if (NULL == pMCParticle)
00336         return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00337 
00338     m_pPfoTarget = pMCParticle;
00339 
00340     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00341 }
